name: Goblin Adventurer Hunting
description:
Repeated exploration and hunting down adventurers in a rogue-like RPG!

Hunt down numerous adventurers and earn money through running a brothel!

■ Story

A goblin burdened with debt...
"Gob, the goblin who hunts adventurers and earns money by running a brothel!"
And so, the goblin's adventurer-hunting journey begins.

■ System

★ Use your earned money to gain advantages in exploration

Collect money and treasures to purchase advantageous items for exploration!
Make the exploration easier and easier!
There is no game over, so you can challenge as many times as you want!

★ Throw captured adventurers into the brothel and make money

By capturing adventurers, you automatically earn money!
Capture as many adventurers as possible!

■ Features

No game over!
A simple rogue-like game where you repeatedly explore and hunt adventurers!

★ Simple yet deeply engaging rogue-like with endless possibilities!

★ Smooth and fast-paced gameplay!

★ Sensual animations that run smoothly!
